name: Life-Logging
body:
## Life-Logging

This project aims at developing a simple and unobtrusive life logger.

```
This is a Work In Progress
```

### Purpose
The Life-Logging project started in the 2011/12 [PVIM](https://fenix.ist.utl.pt/disciplinas/gvip36/?locale=en_EN) course at [IST](http://www.ist.utl.pt/); it is very simple to use and above all really unobtrusive, since the user can control when to execute it.

### Installation
More on that when we finally have something to show you

### Usage
Just press the correct buttons in your keyboard and the life-logger window will popup on your screen

### Testing
I'm sure we'll be creating some test suite to go on with this

### Authors
Feel free to contact us: Fábio Oliveira (@foliveira) and João Dias (@macacao).
